name: Photophobia (dlechette)
description:
While lost on a hiking trip, Lucy finds an abandoned house in the woods. Seeking shelter and food, Lucy wanders inside only to be trapped as the door firmly locks itself behind her.  Inside the dark house, strange noises and baby cries fill the dark space. Only the light can stop these baby ghosts and she makes her way through the house in search of an exit.  With notes from the previous owner of the house, Lucy must stop the vengeful mother ghost before she loses her life.

Made by M.L.L.L Studio

Produced by Robert Lopez-Perez

Programmed by Daniel Lopez-Correa

Levels Designed by Johnathan Martinez

Art and Animation by Demora LeChette

Sound Design by Demora LeChette

Voices by Demora LeChette

Other Sounds from Freesound.org
